title: Apply purple text + swirl background and redirect Play button

requirements.text: Set the app background to visually match the user-uploaded pink/purple swirl reference image, using a full-screen background image (cover, centered) that appears behind all pages (Home and Privacy Policy).

quotes: can you make the backround look like this

acceptanceCriteria: A generated/processed swirl background image is added as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The background is applied app-wide (not just the homepage) and scales to fill the viewport without tiling.
Foreground content remains readable on top of the background (e.g., via subtle overlay, blur, or card backgrounds).

requirements.text: Update the app’s styling so that all user-facing text is purple by default (including headings, body text, navigation text, and footer text), replacing the current amber/orange gradient emphasis where it affects text color.
acceptanceCriteria: Across Home, Header navigation, Footer, and Privacy Policy page, the default text color renders in purple (including previously muted text).
Existing amber/orange text gradients on titles/branding are removed or replaced so the visible text color is purple.
Text remains legible against the new background in both light and dark mode.

requirements.text: Remove emojis from UI text/content (including hero icons and any emoji-prefixed headings) and replace them with non-emoji equivalents (plain text and/or existing icon components) while keeping the same meaning.
acceptanceCriteria: No emoji characters are displayed in Header or Home hero area.
Privacy Policy headings/content no longer include emoji characters (e.g., the lock emoji in the section title is removed).
Layout spacing remains visually balanced after emoji removal.

requirements.text: Make the “Play Now” button on the Home page open the provided Meta experiences URL for Chimp Factory when clicked.

quotes: when you click play it takes you to https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/chimp-factory/25694325243600813/?srsltid=AfmBOopTfM4KbYVw3sF3J36aq3QWgPDUT0W2PgqF3OIlTJEfW63azUvs

acceptanceCriteria: The link uses safe external-link attributes when opened in a new tab (rel="noopener noreferrer").
No backend changes are required for the redirect.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend work is needed for this change.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication providers or third-party integrations beyond a simple external link.
Do not change Privacy Policy text meaning/sections beyond removing emojis and applying the new purple text styling.
Do not implement real-time features or any backend persistence for the Play button behavior.
